description: A script that downloads a PDF file containing Thai recipes, sets up an OpenAI chat agent, and prompts it to extract recipe information from the PDF.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with OpenAI models, manages conversation state, and handles responses.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: File
classes.description: A class representing a media file, used to pass files to the agent.

methods.name: download_file
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL to a specified local path.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and prints the response, optionally with attached files.
